# RemoteKeylessEntryConfigurableEnduringAction.EnduringExecutionRequest

**Class**

An object that reports the results of an action with an optional stopping point.

## Declaration

```swift
@objc final class EnduringExecutionRequest
```

## Overview

When you perform an action, the system creates a [doc://com.apple.CarKey/documentation/CarKey/RemoteKeylessEntryConfigurableEnduringAction/EnduringExecutionRequest] object for your request and returns it to your app. Use the object to send a follow-up request to stop the action. You can also use it to determine the status of the original action.

## Structures

- **RemoteKeylessEntryConfigurableEnduringAction.EnduringExecutionRequest.ContinuationRequest**: Continuation Request

## Instance Properties

- **eventStream**: The asynchronous event stream on which Continuation Requests are sent

## Instance Methods

- **results()**: Returns the results of a preceding action request.
- **stop()**: Sends a request to stop a previously started action.

## Enumerations

- **RemoteKeylessEntryConfigurableEnduringAction.EnduringExecutionRequest.Event**

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
